OrgName: Work.com, a division of salesforce.com, inc.
activities: As part of Salesforce's Web-based applications branded as Work.com provided via http://www.salesforce.com or http://www.work.com, customers are permitted to submit electronic data and information, including personal data, to servers used by Salesforce. Such personal data may include human resources data. In this context, Salesforce acts as a data processor and does not determine how its customers' data is utilized in servers used by Salesforce. Salesforce does not choose or determine the types of data that are submitted to servers used by Salesforce, and any access to, or use of, such data by Salesforce is incidental to completing the contractual obligations of Salesforce, as data processor, to its customers. As part of Salesforce's internal operations, Salesforce transfers personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective business partners for processing and storage. Salesforce collects, transfers, and uses personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective partners for sales, billing, marketing, and business partner recruitment purposes. In this context, Salesforce acts as a data controller.
address: The Landmark @ One Market Street, Suite 300
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President & Chief Legal Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line, client, customer, prospect, and business partner data
